references: I. M. Vinogradov, Elements of Number Theory, pp. 220 ff.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: with(numtheory): i=9: [ seq(primroot(ithprime(i))^j mod ithprime(i), j=0..100) ];
prog: (Sage) [power_mod(5,n,23)for n in xrange(0,63)] # - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 26 2009(MAGMA) [5^n mod 23: n in [0..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 07 2011(PARI) a(n)=lift(Mod(5,23)^n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 22 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
